variable.name: VISIT
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: CESA1
variable.description: 1: Bothered by things that don't bother me
variable.value: Rarely or None of the time (Less than 1 day)
Some or Little of the time (1-2 days)
Occasionally or a Moderate Amount of the Time (3-4 days)
Most or All of the Time (5-7 days)

variable.name: CESA2
variable.description: 2: Not feel like eating / poor appetite
variable.value: Rarely or None of the time (Less than 1 day)
Some or Little of the time (1-2 days)
Occasionally or a Moderate Amount of the Time (3-4 days)
Most or All of the Time (5-7 days)

variable.name: CESA3
variable.description: 3: Could not shake off the blues
variable.value: Rarely or None of the time (Less than 1 day)
Some or Little of the time (1-2 days)
Occasionally or a Moderate Amount of the Time (3-4 days)
Most or All of the Time (5-7 days)
